page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: {BROOK COTTAGES. NEAR TO THE FAT HEN FRUI FARM IN ROUNCIL LANE ARE TWO SEMI-DETATCHED COTTAGES. THEY ARE NOS.1 AND 2, BROOK COTTAGES, SO NAMED BECAUSE THEY ARE SITUATED BESIDE INCHFORD BROOK. { MR.& MRS.BARRATT AND THEIR SON AND {DAUGHTER}HAVE LIVED AT THE COTTAGE FOR THE PAST 12 YEARS. THE CHILDREN ATTEND {CLINTON SCHOOL, KENILWORTH}AND HAVE TO GET THERE BY CAR. THE DAUGHTER ATTENDS {BROWNIES}IN KENILWORTH.MR.BARRATT IS AN ELECTRONICS ENGINEER AND TRAVELS TO WORK BY CAR. MRS,BARRATT IS A HOUSEWIFE WHOSE INTERESTS ARE WALKING GARDENING AND VISITING PLACES OF HISTORICAL INTEREST. SHE DOES NOT GO TO CHURCH. SHE GOES BY CAR TO KENILWORTH TO DO HER SHOPPING. SHE DOES NOT BUY ANY DAIRY PRODUCE FROM THE NEARBY FARMS BUT THEY DO BUY STRAWBERRIES.
